entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Object reference not set to an instance of an object." when using a Preferences.Default.Get in MAUI #25676
  • Default configurations for Debug and Release mode #25675
  • FontImageSource icons not rendered correctly on Android #25673
  • Application.Current.Quit让人无语的严重Bug!!! #25672
  • .NET MAUI Blazor CSS Isolation bug #25669
  • Unable to Run MAUI Apps on Android 11 #25667
  • FilePicker returns null when running iOS app on macOS (not Catalyst) #25661
  • VerticalOptions and HorizontalOptions doesn't applied to the respective Layout #25658
  • ListView: table cells turn black randomly #25656
  • StackLayout inside Scrollview with horizontal orientation not expanding #25655

Closed

  • Navigation freeze the UI when clicking the [Back] button. #25597
  • The version of package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.WindowsForms isn't update to 9.0.0. #25623
  • Release build crashes on start in iOS, Debug build works just fine #25653
  • Android: Minimum and MaximumHeightRequest are not respected on controls when HeightRequest is also set (same for Width) #25163
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Binding context type check fails for relative binding sources #25608
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Waiting for debugger to attach error #25648
  • Did not run app #25659

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr10] Revert PR #23052 behavior under new app context switch #25677
  • Re-Enable Template Tests #25674
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] Measure layout passes in DEBUG #25671
    community ✨
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window
  • Fix issue with FilePicker for iOS apps running on Mac #25668
    community ✨
  • Remove `MeasureInvalidated` bubble-up mechanism and clean-up legacy layouts. #25664
    community ✨
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    community ✨
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
  • Character spacing in button - fix #25657
    community ✨
  • Revert to CV for Tests #25654
    area-testing
  • Skip invalidation on propagation #25652
    .NET 9 SR1

Merged

  • Update developer doc to direct installing VS 17.12 or newer, not 17.10 #25678
  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140
    .NET 8 SR10
  • For Android, respect Minimum/Maximum size requests even when size is set #25164
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, .NET 9 SR1
  • [ci] Templates need xcodeselect #25640
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR1
  • [X] Delay binding context type check until relative binding source is resolved #25600
    .NET 9 SR1

Updated

  • Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25137
    .NET 8 SR10
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area-testing
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Ensure Subviews are Not Covered by Tab Bar #25490
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    area-testing
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR1
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR1
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] Fix scroll bar visibility set to Always not consistant #24901
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR1
  • [iOS] Only invalidate ancestors upon MeasureInvalidated #25465
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fix for OnAppearing of Page called again, although this page was on already replaced NavigationStack #25596
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] Implement ScrollDownTo and ScrollUpTo methods in Appium #25601
    area-testing
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled - UI Test #24142
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #24036
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-flakiness, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] ScrollView's Gradient Background fix #25541
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] Toolbar overflow menu icon color #25627
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Templated indicator view - improvements #25642
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
